Name: luy-mohammadramadha
Author: Mohammad Ramadhan Sebwa, Ramadhan Hajj Ndeka, Ismail Were, Musa Murasi Salim Kukuya, Yusuf Shiundu Malala, Yahya Wafula Ojwang, Haroon Albert Msah

Translations.Text: Niwoluyali ulia wobwaami bwoosi buli mumukhono kukwe naye ni Omunyali wabuli eshindu
Owaloonga lifwa nende obulamu khulwa okhubateema mbu niwina mwinywe ukhola amalayi, naye niye Owaamaani muno, Omunji wobulesheli
Niye owalonga amakulu saba malondokhana. shiwakhalola khubuloonji bwo Omunji Wetsimbabaasi obwawukhani tawe. Kalusiakhwo tsimoni! olalolakhwo obuleemefu bwosibwosi
Mana khandi kalusia tsimoni tsio olwakhabili, tsilakhukalushila omwene, nitsibeelele natsio nitsichoonyele
Ne toto bwene khwarona likulu lieshialo elia hambi nende tsitaa, ne nikhutsikhola okhuba eshikhupo khumashetani, Nekhwabarecheshela eshinyasio shiomulilo
Ne balia bakhaya okhuloonda ka Nyasaye wabu, balinyoola eshinyasio shia Jahanam , ne ni amenjililo amabii po kali karie ako
Ne olwa balisukunwamwo balikuwulila nikuwoola ne nikupupuchila
kukhaaba okhukhalikhamwo khulwoburuma. buli olwa Omukanda kusukunwamwo, abalindi bakwo babareeba mbu: “ Omwikanyilisi shiyabetselakhwo tawe?” wabuli eshindu
Baliboola mbu: “toto bwene abekanyilisi bakhwitsila nenikhubafuukula ne nikhuboola mbu: Nyasaye shiyeshiakhwo shiosishiosi tawe, ‘‘enywe amukhali butswa mubukori obukhongo.’’
Ne baliboola mbu: “khumanyanga khuwulilamanakhuloonda, shikhwakhabeele mubandu bomulilo tawe.”
Ne nibalifuchilila tsimbi tsiabu, mana nibasukunwa mubandu bomumulilo
Toto bwene balia baria Nyasaye wabu mukabalalola, bali nende obulesheli nende omurungo omukhongo
Khole amakhuwa kenyu mubwifisi nohomba mubwang’ang’u, toto Ye amanyile muno akali mumioyo
Yakhakhaywa okhumanya owaloonga, naye niye omumanyi wamakuwa kefisile, mwene amakhuwa
Niye owabakholela liloba okhuba eliangu khubukhala bwenyu, khochendekhwo tsimbeka tsiosi, nemulie khumikabo chichie. Ne ewuwe niwokhulamusibwa
Mparanga mbu muli nomulembe khu ulia uli hekulu mbu shanyala okhubayibisia muliloba nalio nilirenga tawe
Nohomba mparanga mbu mulinomulembe khu ulia uli hekulu, ashili okhubarera omuyeka kweyimbumbuyeka kwetsimbaale?	nemulimanya murie amekanyilisio kanje
Ne toto bwene bamala okhufukula balia bali imbeli wabu, kho mana okhusinyikha khwanje khwalikhurie
Nohomba shibalolangakhwo amayoni hekulu wabu shingala kabambulanga tsimbaya nende kafumbanga halala? shakatililinga tawe halali Omunji Wetsimbabaasi. Toto bwene ye ni Omuloli
Ne kuli hena omukanda kwenyu oko kwabalwani kwokhubahabina owulali omuunji wetsimbabaasi? Toto bwene abakhayi shibali khusiosishiosi tawe halali mukhukatania
Nohomba niwina oyo ulabahelesia omukabo, Ye niyekalila omukabo kukwe? halali abo bahandilasa khubufuru nende ishinda
Koo, ulia uchendanga niyetukumula nabushila khubweni bwe, nomulunjifu muno nohomba ulia uchendanga shiluunji khunjila ingololofu
Boola mbu: Ye niwabaloonga olwambeli, nabahelesia amarwi nende tsimoni, nende emioyo. Ne oriomuno yenyu ni inditi muno
Boola ye niye wabasaalasia khushialo na ewuwe niwa mulikhung’asibwa
Nebaboolangambu:“Niliinakamulakanga kano, nikali mbu muboolanga obwatoto?”
Boola obumanyi bwe inyanga eyo buli khu Nyasaye, nasi endi butswa omwikanyilisi wahabulafu
Olwa balilola kabalakwa nikakhoola, obweni bwabakhayi bulisinyikha, nebaliboolelwa mbu: “kano niko kamwafukulanga.”
Boola mbu mulola murie Nyasaye niyasishia halala nende balininasi, nohomba nakhubeela tsimbabaasi, niwina ulirunga abakhayi eshinyasio eshilulu
Boola mbu: “ Ye niye Omunji wetsimbabaasi khwamusuubila ne niye wakhwesika.	nemulimanya niwina ulimubukori bulolekha
Boola mbu: “ mulola murie amaatsi kenyu nikakhama niwina ulabarerera amaatsi kakhulukusinjia
Nun, nditsuba khukalamu nende kabahandikanga
Ewe khutsimbabaasi tsia Nyasaye wuwo sholi omulalu tawe
Netoto bwene oli nomurungo omukhongo kulaliwa tawe
Netoto bwene oli nende ebima ebilayi
Hambi ano olalola nabo bosi nibalole
Ni wina mwinywe womurwe omubii
Toto bwene Nyasaye wuwo niye umanyile muno ulia wakora okhurula khunjila yiyie, ne amanyile muno ulia ulikhubulunjifu
Olaloonda balia abamainji tawe
Bekombanga mbu wakhatoratosiyekhwo nabo bakhutoratosilia
Ne olaloonda buli ulia witsubanga muno Oweshileka Omutswatswani tawe
Uyiyayiyanga natswatswania
Umwikalili wamalayi, Owetsimbi Omwonooni
Womwoyo omwangaranu, khulwa ako nomwonooni wamanyikhana khutsimbi
Khulwokhubeela, ali nende emiandu nende Abana
Nibasomelwa amahandiko kefu nibaboola mbu: “etso nit’singano tsiabakhale.”
Khulamurakhwo eshimanyisio khuliulu lilie
Netoto bwene khulabatema , shinga khwatema Abandu bomukunda, olwabetsuba mbu balauna okhuchesa obulachweya
Ne nibalaboola mbu: “ Nyasaye nachama” tawe
Awo, eshikhole shiamaraba, okhurula khu Nyasaye nishikholekha khumukunda oko nabo nibali mutsindoolo
Nikuba neshiilima eshikhongo
Nibalaangana mumabwibwi nibushiele
Tsie mumukunda kwenyu nimuli toto mbu mutsitsanga okhuchesa
Ne nibarula	nibasungana mubwimoonyo
Mbu abulaho Omumanani yesi- yesi ulenjila mumukunda olwa lelo
Ne nibarula mumabwibwi nibasuubile
Olwa bakulola baboola mbu,: “toto bwene khukorere.”
Halali efwe khwimilwe
Omulayi mubo naboola mbu: “shebaboolelekhwo,	khulwashina mularetsanga Nyasaye mumioyo chenyu ?”
Nibaboola mbu : “ niwoluyali Nyasaye wefu toto efwe khuli abonooni “
Nibakalukhana abeene khubeene okhufunanania
Nibaboola mbu: “abaane efwe! khuruumile eshichelo”
Awundi Nyasaye wefu alakhuwa amalayi okhushila kano, efwe khukalushila Nyasaye wefu
Endio nilweshinyasio shili, ne eshinyasio sheyindukho neshikhongo muno, bamangakhwo bayie
Toto bwene balia abaria Nyasaye wabu baliba nende emikunda chobwokholo
Ne, khwakhakhola abasalamu shinga aboononi
Mukhabeele murie? mubusinjia murie
Nohomba	mulineshitabu shiamusomanga mwo
Mbu mulanyoolamwo akamwayanza
Nohomba muli nebitsubo khwifwe, ebiliboosia khu inyanga yeyindukho, mbu toto bwene mulinyoola koosi pe kamubusinjia
Barebe mbu: “ni wina mubo Omwimilisi wakano
Nohomba bali nende abasaanji ? mana babarere nikali mbu baboolanga akatoto
Inyanga lwomuluku kulifunulwa, nebalilangwa okhwinamila Nyasaye, neshibalinyalilwa tawe
Tsimoni tsiabu tsilihenga hasi, tsisoni tsilibalia toto bwene balaangungwa okhwinamila Nyasaye ( nibali khushialo) nibali abalamu
Ndeshela balia bafukula likhuwa lino, khulabasitilia eshinyasio kalahakalaha munjila yabalamanyile tawe
Ne ndalabahelesia ebise, amaraba kanje ni amasiro
Nohomba ebasabanga omurungo nabo bashilungwa eshichelo esho
Nohoma bali nende kefisa kabahandikanga
Linda shinga Nyasaye wuwo yetsa okhubusia, ne olaba shinga omundu weyimonye, olwayalaanga nafwinyiikhe
Tsikhanyanga okhumuulila tsimbabaasi okhurula khu Nyasaye wuwe, yakhasalilwe khulukuku nafunanibwa
Halali Nyasaye wuwe Omulesi namwawula , namukhola okhuba mubandu abalayi
Ne abakhayi hambi hatiti bakhukwisie khulwe tsimoni tsiabu, olwabawulilanga ametsulisio ka-Nyasaye. Nibaboolanga mbu: “ toto bwene ye ni omulalu.”
Ne amakhuwa kano (Ikurani) shikali halali ni ametsulisio khubiloonje bioosi
Eliatoto. (lilirurila)
Nilili hena elo eliatoto? (elilirurila)
Ne nishina shikhumanyia eliatoto elo
Abandu ba Tsamudi nende A’ad bayingana khu amasila karenjinjia omwoyo
Mana Abandu ba Aa’d basishibwa nende amasila amakali
Ne Abandu ba A’ad basishibwa nomuyeka kweyimbumbuyeka
Okwayabarumila khubilo saba nende tsinyanga munane tsilondokhana, olola Abandu nibalambalile shinga emisala chie mitende emikhaya
Kho ololakhwo yesiyesi mubo Watong’a
Ne Firauni ni yetsa nende abali imbeli wuwe, nende tsingongo tsiakalukhanibwa hasi niba hekulu, okhurulana nende tsimbi tsiabu
Nibakhaya okhuloonda Omurumwa wa Nyasaye wabu, ne mana nabakhamara obutinyu
Toto lwa amaatsi ketsula khwabachinga Muliaro
Khulwokhukhola ako kabe eshitsulisio khwinywe ne shikawulile eshirwi shamachesi
Olwo olwika lulikhupwa umukhupo mulala
Ne eshialo nende tsingulu lwabilichingwa, ne nibiswakwa halala
Inyanga eyo niyo olwe indukho ilirulila
Ne likulu lilirandukha , nalio inyanga eyo liliba liteshele
Ne Abamalaika baliba khundulo khwalio, ne munane mubo balichinga ishisaala shiomwami wuwo, hekulu wabu
Inyanga eyo mulirebwa habulafu mwesi, ne shibulaho shiosishosi shilifisa mwinye
Ne ulia ulihebwa eshitabu shishie nomukhono omuluunji aliboola mbu: “itse musomekhwo eshitabu shianjie”
Toto bwene ndali ndamanya ndilihebwa omukabo kwanje
Naye aliba mubulamu buchamisia
Mumukunda kwa hekulu. (mujanna ya hekulu)
Ebiamo biakwo bili ahambi
Lie mana munywe mubusangafu okhurulana nende kamwakholanga mushialo
Ne ulia ulihebwa eshitabo shishie nomukhono omukhasi, aliboola mbu manyanga ekhaya okhuhebwa eshitabu shianje
Mana Kata ekhaya okhumanya omukabo kwanje
Khamashile lifwa liakhamalile elala ( ndakhaya okhulamusibwa)
Emiandu	chianje	shichiakhoonya shosishosi tawe
Obwami bwanje bwasishia
Mumubukule mumuboye
Mana mumusukune mumulilo
Mana mumuboyokanie nomunyororo kweshichelo shiemikhono amakhumi saba
Toto bwene shiyali yasuubila Nyasaye woluyali tawe
Nohomba	shiyatinyisia	okhulisia abamanani tawe
Mana lwalelo ano abula Omwitsa
Nohomba eshiakhulia halali (ghisleen) amafila
shibashiliitsanga halali Abandu betsimbi
Nenditsuba khubiamulolanga
Nende khubia mulalolanga
Toto	bwene	namakhuwa	ako Omurumwa Owoluyali
Ne shinamakhuwa ko mwimbi tawe, obusubili bwenyu nibutiti po
Nohomba shinamakhuwa komufumu tawe, okhupara khwenyu nokhutiti muno
Keshibwa okhurula khu Nyasaye webiloonje biosi
Ne okhuchishilanga amakhuwa kandi
Toto khwakhamutilile nende omukhono omulunji
Mana khwakhamukhalake omusi kwo mwoyo
Ne	awumao	yesiyesi	mwinywe wakhakhwikalile
Ne ako ni amachelo khubaria Nyasaye
Ne toto bwene khwamanya mbu mwinywe balimwo abakhayi
Ne toto bwene abakhayi baliyitsulisia
Ne nibwatoto bubulamwo tsinganakani
Kho mana itsoomia elira lia Nyasaye wuwo waluyali
Umureebi yereeba okhulondokhana nende eshinyasio eshiakharulile
Khubakhayi alibulaho ulishiikalila
Okhurula khuNyasaye Omwene hekulu tsiachelekhana
Abamalaika nende Roho baninanga nibatsia ewuwe khutsinyanga esichelo shiatsio ni emika iyelefu amakhumi karano
Kho	wisumilisie	ukhwisumilisia okhulayi
Toto abo bayilolanga mbu ili ehale
Nafu khuyilolanga mbu ili ahambi
Inyanga yelikulu liliba shinga eshichuma shisalululwe
Ne tsingulu tsiliba shinga ipamba
Ne Omwitsa shalireeba owashie tawe
Balibalola, Omwononi yakhekombe okhwinunula khushinyasio shieyinyanga eyo khulwokhuyinia Abana be
Nende	omukhaye	wuwe	nende Omusiani wabu
Nende abeekho baye abamukhonyanga
Nende bioosi bili mushialo, mana ye ahonokoshe
Shikali kario tawe! Toto oko ni omulilo omululu
Kunyibululanga likhoba lwomurwe
Kulilaanga buli omukhayi weshileka
Wabunjelesinjia omwandu nakubiikha
Toto Omundu yaloongwa angalukhani
Nanyoolwa na masila yetswulikania
Ne nanyoola amalayi yemana
Okhuiniakhwo abalaamanga
Balia bakholelanga eshinani amalaamo kabu obulachweya (iswala)
Nende balia bomumwandu kwabu kulimwo omukabo omulobole
Khu usaba nende khu uritsanga okhusaba
Nende balia basuubilanga inyanga yomurungo
Nende balia baritsanga eshinyasio shia Nyasaye wabu
Toto eshinyasio shia Nyasaye wabu omulesi sishili shawakhasuubila okhuhonokokhamwo tawe
Nende balia abalindanga ebiekenyi biabu
Okhuyiniakhwo khubateshi (abakhasi ) baabu, nohomba balia babaruka bali mumikhono chiabu emisatsa, toto abo shibafunanibwa tawe
Ne balia abokhwenya kalali kano tawe, abo nibo baruma eshichelo
Nende balia balindanga obulayi obwisikwa nende indakano yabu
Nende balia bemanga shilunji khubuloli bwabu
Nende balia balindanga iswala yabu
Abo nibo balinjisibwa mwikulu
Balibarie abakhayi, abakhwitsilanga mubunji nibakhunga’nga’lilakhwo butswa
Emikanda nemikanda, na mukhono musatsa nende namukhono mukhasi
Koo buli yesiyesi aparanga mbu alinjila mwikulu liobwokholo
Shikalikario	tawe,	khwabalonga okhurulana nende khushiabamanyile
Nditsuba khu Nyasaye, Omulesi – webukwe nende mumbo- toto efwe khulinobunyali
Bwokhukalukhasia abalayi bashilakhwo abo nafu shikhwakhashilwa tawe
Khobaleshe, mubukalakala nende emibayo chiabu, okhula lwabalinyoolana nende inyanga yabalakwa
Inyanga yabakharule mubilindwa mulwangu shinga belushilanga okhuula khushimanyisio
Obweni bwabu bulihenga hasi, tsisoni tsilibafumbeela, eyo niyo inyanga yabalakungwa
Toto efwe khwaruma Nuh khubandu bebe mbu: “wikanyilisilie abandubo, eshinyasio eshilulu nishishili okhuboolela.”
Naboola mbu: “ Enywe Abandu baanje! esie endi Omwikanyilisi wenyu wahabulafu.”
Mulaame Nyasaye, ne Mumurie, ne muloonde amalako keke
Alabaleshela tsimbi tsienyu, ne alabameta tsinyanga okhula indukho yenyu. Toto indukho ya Nyasaye niyuula yibetsanga yulile. Abaane nimwakhamanyilekhwo
Naboola mbu : “ Nyasaye wanje, esie anaanjile Abandu banje eshilo nende eshitere
Habula omulaango kwanje shikwabamatela shiosi shiosi tawe halali okhwilukha
Ne toto buli olwebalanjile mbu khonyoole okhubaleshela, baara tsinzala tsiabu mumarwi kabu , nibefunikha tsingubo tsiabu nibekhulumamia nibooma emirwe obutinyu muno
Mana khandi toto nebalanga mubwang’aang’u
Mana khandi nebakhuumila obutinyu, mana khandi nebalaanga mubwifisi
Nebaboolela mbu: “ sabe eshileshelo Nyasaye wenyu, toto ye ni Omunji wokhuleshela.”
Alabarerera ifula ikwe nilondokhana
Ne alabahelesia Omwandu nende Abana, ne alabahelesia emikunda nende emialo
Muli murie amulahetsanga Nyasaye eshiriibwa
Ne toto yabaloonga likhabi khwikhabi
Shimulolanga shingala Nyasaye yalonga amakulu saba nikalondokhaane
Nakhola omwesi okhubamwo obulafu ne nakhola eliuba okhuba itaa
Ne Nyasaye yabamesia khwiloba shinga emimela
Khandi alibakalusiamwo, nekhandi alibarusiamwo mwesi burusia
Ne Nyasaye wabakholela eshialo okhuba shinga omukeka
Khomunyoole okhucheendamwo khutsinjila tsimbambalifu
Nuhu naboola mbu: “ Nyasaye wanje Omulesi, toto bo baakhayile, nibaloonda khu ulia owulabametelwakhwo shiosi shiosi khumwandu kukwe nende omwana wuwe halali okhusikha
Ne nibakhola ebifwanga ebikhongo
Ne nibaboola mbu: “olalekhakhwo Abanyasaye benyu tawe, nohomba olalekhakhwo	Wada	nohomba Suwa,nohomba Yaghutsa nohomba Nasra
Netoto bo bamala okhukosia abaanji, ne olabameta balia abonooni halali obukori
Okhurulana nende tsimbi tsiabu berwa namatsi, mana nibenjisibwa mumulilo, neshibanyoola ubahabina owulali Nyasaye tawe
Ne Nuhu naboola mbu: “ Nyasaye wanje Omulesi, olalekhakhwo khushialo abamenyakhwo yesiyesi mubakhayi tawe
Toto Ewe nobalekhakhwo , balakosia Abasumba bobo, neshibalebula halali abonooni abakhayi

Nyasaye wanje Omulesi! undeshele esie nende Abebusi banje, nende ulia wenjila munzu yanje Omusuubili, nende abo boosi abasubila abasatsa nende abakhasi. ne olameta abonooni shiosi shiosi tawe halali obukori
Boola mbu: ‘‘enyoolele obufimbuli mbu toto omukanda mulala kwa Majini kwarechelesia nikuboola mbu: “efwe toto bwene khuwulile Ikurani yokhuchenyia
Ilunjisinjia khubulunjifu, mana khuyisuubile, neshikhulisaasia Nyasaye wefu Omulesi nende shiosishiosi tawe
Ne toto bwene Nyasaye wefu niwoluyali olukhongo abula Omukhasi nohomba Omwana
Ne khubwatoto abasilu mwifwe baboolanga khu Nyasaye obubeyi
Ne efwe toto khwaparanga mbu Abandu nende Amajini shibanyala okhuboola obubeyi khu Nyasaye tawe
Netoto bwene Abasatsa okhurula Mubandu, bakhabanga okhwilinda khubasatsa beshijini, mana nibabameta tsimbi
Netoto abo baparanga shingala muparanga mbu, Nyasaye shaliruma yesi yesi tawe
Ne toto khwatila khulikulu nikhunyoola lietsulaabalindiabalulunendetsing’ining’ini tsiomulilo
Ne toto bwene khwekhalangamwo nikhurechelesia ne uletsa okhurechelesia bulaano alabukanana nende tsing’ining’ini tsiomulilo omululu
Ne efwe shikhumanyile tawe nibenyelwa amabii abali khushialo nohomba Nyasaye wabu nabenyela obulunjifu
Ne toto bwene mwifwe khulimwo nende abakholi bamalayi, ne abaandi balimwo balali bario tawe, khuli emikanda chikabukhane
Ne efwe khwamanya mbu shikhunyala okhushila Nyasaye khushialo tawe, neshikhunyala okhumushila tsimbilo tawe
Ne efwe olwakhawulila obulunjifu khwabufuchilila. ne usuubila mu Nyasaye wuwe Omulesi , sharitsanga okhwibilwa nohomba okhuboolelwa kalali katoto tawe
Ne toto mwifwe balimwo Abasalamu, nende abalekha katoto, ne balia basilima, abo nibo baloonda obulunjifu
Ne balia balekha obwatoto baliba tsikhwi etsio mulilo kwa jahanam
Ne balunjikhanga khunjila yatoto, khwakhabanywesie amaatsi amaanji
Khulwo okhubatema khuko, ne ulechelesia amachelo ka Nyasayewe alanyoola eshinyasio eshilulu.’’
Ne toto emisikiti ni chia Nyasaye , kho mulalaama halala nende Nyasaye shiosishiosi tawe
Ne toto olwa Omusumba wa Nyasaye yasinjila namulaama, ako (amajini) kalihambi okhumufwinya
Boola mbu: “ toto esie enamanga Nyasaye wanje omulesi ne shemutsokaasinjiakhwo nende yesi yesi tawe
Boola mbu: “esie embula obunyali bwokhubawumisia	nohomba okhubalunjisia
Boola mbu: “toto abulaho yesiyesi unyala okhuuninda okhurulana nende eshinyasio shia Nyasaye, ne shindilinyoola andakhelushila tawe halali khuye
Halali ndusie oburume okhurula khu Nyasaye nende indakano Ye, ne ukhaya Nyasaye nende Omurumwa wuwe, kho toto balinyoola Omulilo kwa jahanam, balimenyamwo tsinyanga tsiosi
Okhula olwa balilola kabalakungwa balimanya mbu niwina omuteshele mubukhoonyi nende omuleemu
Boolambu:‘ esieengorwakamulakungwa kano nikali ahambi nohomba Nyasaye alakasitia ehale.”
Omumanyi wakefisile, ne shafunulilanga yesiyesi akefisa tawe
Halali ulia wayachamila Mubarumwa, ne toto oyo amwelesinjia abalindi imbeli nende inyuma
Kho anyoole okhumanya toto bosia oburume bwa Nyasaye wabu, naye yamanya obulayi akabali ninako, ne yamanya obubasio bwabuli eshindu
Ewe Owifimbile
Bukha mushilo shiosi, halali hatiti butswa
eshitonye shiashio nohomba oleemiekhwo hatiti
Nohomba ometekhwo, ne osoome Ikurani mushiroonyo
Toto efwe khwitsa okwishilia likhuwa lisiro
Toto okhubukha eshilo, omwoyo kukwalalanga muno, ne amakhuwa kashio kabetsanga amalunjifu muno
Ne toto bwene ewe obetsanga nende okhubotokhana okhunji mushitere
Kho lirumbule elira lia Nyasaye wuwo Omulesi, wirusilie khuye elala
Nyasaye Omulesi we bukwe nende mumbo, abulaho Nyasaye wundi owulali ye, khomukhole Omwisikwa wuwo
Ne wifwile khukababoolanga, ne abawuyekhwo mubulayi
Ndeshela Abaingani abali mubwokholo, ne obahelesie obwiyangu butiti
Toto bwene efwe khuli nende tsirimba tsisiro nende omulilo omululu
Nende eshilibwa shirekamanga mumworokoro nende eshinyasio eshilulu
Inyanga lwe eshialo shilirenga nende tsingulu tsiosi ne tsingulu tsilibulungukha shinga olufu
Toto efwe khwabarumila Omurumwa abe Omuloli wenyu, shingla khwarumila Firauni Omurumwa
Halali Firauni yaloba Omurumwa oyo, mana nikhumutila okhutila kweshinyasio
Nemuliba murie shingala mukhayanga, inyanga yabana balimela tsimbutsi
Owo likulu liliatikha! Ne awo kayalachisilia kaliikholekha
Toto bwene kano ni ametsulisio. owenya atile injila ya Nyasaye wuwe Omulesi

Toto Nyasaye wuwo Omulesi, yamanya mbu ewe wemanga nolaama ahambi eshilo shiosi, nohomba eshitonye shiashio nohomba mukhuwa khwashio, nende omukanda kulia kuli halala ninawe, ne Nyasaye niye ureranga eshilo neshitere, yamanya mbu shimunyala okhumanya okhubala tawe, mana nabalolela tsimbabaasi, kho some shiamunyalilwa mukurani,yamanyambumwinywebalimwo abalwale, ne abandi bekhupatsakananga khushialo, nibakhaaba tsimbabaasi tsia Nyasaye, Nabo abandi balwanilanga injila ya Nyasaye, khosoome wamunyalilwa mushio, Mana mlaame iswala obulachweya ne muhinie eshihanwa, ne mwiwosie Nyasaye likofi lilayi, ne shiamuranjilisilia emioyo chienyu khukhukhola amalayi mulishinyoola ewa Nyasaye, Ye ni Omulayi womurungo omukhongo muno, Ne musabe Nyasaye eshileshelo toto Nyasaye ni Omunji wakhuleshela Owetsimbabaasi muno
Ewe Owifumbesiye mutsingubo
Bukha wikanyilisie

Ne khulwa Nyasaye wuwo Omulesi, wisumilisie
Mana olwa olwikwa lulikhupwa
Kho inyanga eyo iliba inyanga indinyu muno

Ndekha, nende wandaloonga sienyene

Nende Abaana balolekha
Ne nemukasilia amakhuwa obulayi muno
Mana khandi yekombanga mbu emumeete
Shikali kario tawe, toto ye yakholelanga eshileka amakhuwa kefu. (Ikurani)

Ne shikhwakhola abalindi bomulilo halali ni Abamalaika, ne shikhwakhola isaabu yabu eyo halali ukhubeyiabeyia Abakhayi, kho babe nobulaamba balia bahebwe eshitabu, ne Abasuubila bamete obusuubili, ne balaba nokhukanakana balia bahebwa eshitabu nende abasuubila khobaboole balia bali nobulwale mumioyo chiabu nende abakhayi mbu: “Nyasaye yenyanga shina, okhurulana khukano?” Endio nilwa Nyasaye akosinjia Owayenyele, nalunjisia Owanyele, na awumao umanyile omukanda kwe liyie kwa Nyasaye wuwo Omulelesi halali ye Omwene, ne kono shinishiosi shiosi tawe halali ni amechelo khu Bandu

Toto efwe khwarecheshela Abakhayi eminyororo nende tsirimba nende omulilo omululu
Toto Abandu abalayi balinywa eshinywebwa shiasasibwa mwo ‘kafura’
Ne Isebele ya Abandu ba Nyasaye balinywamwo, bali ikhola ikhulukusie mubunji
Bakholanga kabalaka, ne baritsanga inyanga yobusiro bwayio buliswana
Ne balisinjia eshilibwa, khulwo khuyanza khukhwe Abamanani, nende Abafwilwa nende Ababoye
Toto efwe khubalisinjia khulwokhwenya tsimbabasi tsia Nyasaye shikhubenyakhwo omurungo nohomba orio muno tawe
Toto efwe khuritsaanga okhurulana khu Nyasaye wefu Omulesi, inyanga yobutinyu nende Omusando
Kho mana Nyasaye alibalinda , okhurulana khubusiro bwe inyanga eyo, ne alibabukanilia nomwikhoyo nende obusangafu
Nealibarungaemikundachomwikulu nende tsingubo tsieshironyo, khulwa okhwifwila khwabu
Omo baliyekha khubisaala bioluyali, shibalilolamwo omubasu omululu nohomba omunyiri omululu tawe
Ne ebinikha biliba ahambi ninabo, ne – ebiamo- bilieletsanga okhuula hasi
Ne balitendelwa khubindu bie ifedha nende vikombe bie tsigilasi
